contentencoded:
$99. 100,000 pets. 7500. 50,000. 174 years. Do you know what these numbers mean?

It's time for Silicon Tally. This week, Cory Doctorow, science fiction author and co-editor of Boing Boing, takes the test.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, November 29, 2013
description: $99. 100,000 pets. 7500. 50,000. 174 years. Do you know what these numbers mean?
title: How many bitcoins do you have? This week's Silicon Tally
